name: Dead World
storyline:
As a result of several armed conflicts between different European countries, the world as we knew it was destroyed. Argentina, despite being a neutral country during the conflict, was bombed and today Buenos Aires, its capital, is uninhabitable.

THE LOST WAGON
Carlos and Miguel receive a job in which they will have to go to Rosario to see what happened to a cart that was supposed to reach the Entre Ríos settlement of San Diego.
summary: Embark on a great journey through the dead world controlling Adam Jones, who will search for answers about the kidnapping of his friends, dodging death on more than one occasion
